--- conversion_functions_safe_cast.sql
SAFE_CAST("apple" AS INT64)
--- AST
&ast.CastExpr{
  Cast:   0,
  Rparen: 26,
  Safe:   true,
  Expr:   &ast.StringLiteral{
    ValuePos: 10,
    ValueEnd: 17,
    Value:    "apple",
  },
  Type: &ast.SimpleType{
    NamePos: 21,
    Name:    "INT64",
  },
}

--- SQL
SAFE_CAST("apple" AS INT64)
